Directions: Unroll pizza dough; place on two greased 12-in. pizza pans. Bake at 425 degrees F for 6-7 minutes or until golden brown. In a skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Add sloppy joe sauce. Spread over crusts. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake at 425 degrees F for 6-8 minutes or until cheese is melted.
